name: Special Characters passed as a coordinates for param - roomSize in the Request Body and getting Expected output

steps.name: Given I Set POST request api endpoint
When I Set HEADER param request content type as "application/json."
When Set invalid request Body by passing special characters for the room size parameters
And Send a POST HTTP request
Then I receive error status code 400
And response error as Bad Request

fullName: Test Imaginary Robot for Valid and Invalid Input values for roomSize params: Special Characters passed as a coordinates for param - roomSize in the Request Body and getting Expected output
